revised_title: Obituary of David Lindsay, Earl of Crawford and Balcarres
tldr: This obituary honors David Lindsay, Earl of Crawford and Balcarres, a well-rounded individual with interests in art, history, and public service. He served in various positions, including President of the Board of Agriculture and Fisheries, Lord Privy Seal, and Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster. His passion for art led him to chair the Fine Art Commission and the Council for the Preservation of Rural England, where he promoted the preservation of the countryside and architectural beauty. He was also a writer, authoring books on art and sculpture.
